p: RD, AMD and SLE are the ocular impairments most affected by climate change, the cost of addressing them doubling due to environmental factors ( Figure 3). Concerning the 30 years forecast, if the actual trend continues without intervention, diseases such as RD, AMD, Glaucoma, Cataracts, VHZ, VHS, RA, IBD and SLE will increase their incidence, and, subsequently, their associated burden.
